item.title: Leland add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Leland add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "When I walk, I walk with you. Where I go, you're with me always." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Leland add a quote by A.A. Milne
Leland add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Stay is a charming word in a friend's vocabulary." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Leland add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "Why did you do all this for me?' he asked. 'I don't deserve it. I've never done anything for you.' 'You have been my friend,' replied Charlotte. 'That in itself is a tremendous thing." -- E.B. White

item.title: Leland add a quote by Jim Henson
item.description: "There's not a word yet, for old friends who've just met." -- Jim Henson

item.title: Leland add a quote by Phyllis Moore
item.description: "I am completely happy. My sister is here, and because my sister is here I am somehow more me." -- Phyllis Moore

item.title: Leland add a quote by Jandy Nelson
item.description: "There were once two sisters who were not afriad of the dark because the dark was full of the other's voice across the room, because even when the night was thick and starless they walked home together from the river seeing who could last the longest without turning on her flashlight, not afraid because sometimes in the pitch of night they'd lie on their backs in the middle of the path and look up until the stars came back and when they did, they'd reach their arms up to touch them and did." -- Jandy Nelson

item.title: Leland add a quote by Mary-Kate & Ashley Olsen
item.description: "I am the cute one! She's just my sister." -- Mary-Kate & Ashley Olsen

item.title: Leland add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Dogs are the leaders of the planet. If you see two life forms, one of them's making a poop, the other one's carrying it for him, who would you assume is in charge." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Leland add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Did you ever have a sister? did you?" -- William Faulkner
